thread.section_title: Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Breakfast is good!
thread.title_full: Breakfast is good! - Review of Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: 123114celiav
title: Breakfast is good!
text: Breakfast was hot and there was many choices to choose from. The rooms were nice and clean. The beds covers and sheets are very comfortable and fresh. However, the shower could have used a shower curtain because the water went all over the floor. Luckily they give you lots of towels. We had forgotten our toothbrushes and toothpaste I called the front desk and they sent our a super cool R2D2 look a like to deliver some to our room. My daughter thought this was the coolest hotel ever! Overall, We enjoyed our stay!
